root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 14-a-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 14. Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development14.a Increase scientific knowledge, strengthen research capacity and transfer marine techniques, in accordance with the Criteria and Guiding Principles of the Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission for the Transfer of Marine Techniques, the objective being to improve the health of the oceans and strengthen the contribution of marine biodiversity to the development of developing countries, in particular small island developing States and least developed countries14.a.1 Proportion of total research budget allocated to research on marine techniquesPercentage of budget allocated to research on marine techniquesPercentageShare of the budget allocated to research on marine techniquesNot available
